projects.title: CodeAgent AI Development System
projects.description: Production-grade multi-agent AI system with 322K+ lines of Python code across 1,135 files. Orchestrates multiple LLMs for intelligent code generation and system automation.
highlights: Multi-LLM orchestration with Claude, GPT-4, and specialized models
Advanced prompt engineering and context management
Distributed task execution with intelligent routing

projects.title: Resume Automation Pipeline
projects.description: Sophisticated automation system processing 50-60 tailored resumes with dynamic LaTeX compilation and intelligent content matching.
highlights: Intelligent job description parsing with NLP
Automated skill matching and content optimization

projects.title: Managed Solution Internal Operations Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive internal platform serving multiple business operations with integrated applications supporting company-wide automation and management.

projects.title: Enterprise Multi-Tenant SaaS Architecture
projects.description: Scalable SaaS platform built with Django 5.2+, React 18+, and Ruby on Rails. Processes 1000+ tickets daily with intelligent routing.
highlights: Azure AD integration with MSAL authentication

projects.title: Advanced RAG Knowledge System
projects.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with vector embeddings and semantic search across enterprise documentation.
highlights: Vector database with semantic search capabilities

projects.title: AI Development Infrastructure
projects.description: Comprehensive AI development platform with model versioning, experiment tracking, and automated deployment pipelines.
highlights: Automated model training and evaluation pipelines
A/B testing framework for model comparison

projects.title: Enterprise AD User Management System
projects.description: PowerShell-based Active Directory automation system managing 5000+ users with advanced RBAC and compliance features.

projects.title: Domain & SSL Certificate Monitoring Suite
projects.description: Automated monitoring system for domain expirations and SSL certificates with ConnectWise PSA integration for proactive ticket creation.

projects.title: Intelligent Conda Environment Generator
projects.description: AI-powered tool that analyzes Python projects to automatically generate accurate conda environment files with dependency resolution.

projects.title: Microsoft Graph Migration Toolkit
projects.description: Enterprise-grade Microsoft 365 tenant migration system with comprehensive backup, assessment, and automated migration capabilities.
highlights: HTML report generation with migration insights

projects.title: CSV Contact Import Automation
projects.description: Intelligent CSV parser and contact importer with advanced mapping, validation, and bulk import capabilities for CRM systems.
highlights: Smart column mapping with AI assistance

projects.title: Python Class Organizer
projects.description: Development tool that splits monolithic Python scripts into modular classes and combines them back for single-file deployment.

projects.title: ConnectWise Document Processor
projects.description: Utility bot for processing and transforming ConnectWise documentation with intelligent parsing and structured output generation.

projects.title: Advanced AD User Manager with Auto-Detection
projects.description: Sophisticated Active Directory user management system with smart OU detection and automated configuration discovery.
highlights: LDAP and DC server mode flexibility

projects.title: ConnectWise Member Location Tracker
projects.description: Retrieves and tracks member location and work role information from ConnectWise time entries with retry logic and API optimization.
highlights: Time entry to member location mapping
Intelligent retry logic with exponential backoff

projects.title: Character Encoding & Non-ASCII Detector
projects.description: Advanced text encoding detection and non-ASCII character analysis tool for file processing and data validation.
highlights: Intelligent encoding detection with confidence scoring

projects.title: Intelligent Data Extraction Utility
projects.description: High-performance regex-based data extraction tool with numeric value parsing and type conversion capabilities.

projects.title: HTTP Client API Inspector
projects.description: Development utility for inspecting and analyzing API client structures, methods, and integration patterns.
